name: arman-personal-page
description: a personal page to show experiences and link to created websites

scripts.dev: concurrently "lsof -t -i tcp:5000 | xargs kill -9" "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Arman Feili
